long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove all Tweets with a hexagonal profile picture from your Twitter timeline. Never see any Tweets from anyone with a connected NFT profile picture.

This extension hides all Tweets from users with the new TwitterBlue NFT profile picture setting. (Note that this does not automatically block them, it just hides their Tweets)

This extension works automatically as you navigate Twitter, and does not require you to click the extension (unless you change it by right clicking on the extension)
